DOC.brief_summary: Zoledronic acid medicine study people low bone mass . Side effect headache , fever , muscle ache , pain , may occur follow infusion . This study investigate use over-the-counter medicine improve symptom .
DOC.brief_title: To Assess Efficacy Over-the-counter Analgesics Prevention/Treatment Transient Post-dose Symptoms Following Zoledronate Infusion Post-menopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Women great equal 45 year less equal 75 year age inclusive Low bone mineral density Certain prior treatment low bone mass/osteopenia Current use medicine ( prescription nonprescription ) pain , fever , inflammation Impaired kidney function Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
